long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1086 TableWithSelectboxes.PNG
Our application displays a table in which the user can change values using selectboxes, see attached screenshot TableWithSelectboxes.PNG.
Qooxdoo offers a celleditor for selectboxes: qx.ui.table.celleditor.SelectBox, but Qooxdoo does not offer a corresponding cellrenderer in the package qx.ui.table.cellrenderer.
Due to this missing cell renderer, the user gets no indication that he could click on the table to open the selectbox.
Therefore I would request for the enhancement to offer a cellrenderer for selectboxes.
As far as I know, it it not trivial to create a own cellrenderer for selectboxes. Or am I wrong?

Thanks for the report. I think thats a good enhancement!
(In reply to comment #0) > As far as I know, it it not trivial to create a own cellrenderer for > selectboxes. Or am I wrong?
I'm not into building cell renderer currently so I can't tell. But its a good idea to have that in qooxdoo so its a good idea to add it to the framework. When do you need that?

> When do you need that?
The person that wrote the concept for this table expects that this selectbox-cellrenderer shall be visible now. I assume that this person will open a bug report for our application once he sees that the selectbox-cellrenderer is missing. But I do not yet know the priority of this expected bug report.

Created attachment 1107 TableWithSelectboxes_is_should.PNG
The attached image TableWithSelectboxes_is_should.PNG shows a comparison how the table currently looks like and how it should be.

Thank you for that information.
I will implement the cell renderer for selectboxes in the next few days. After this is done, I can finally close this case. Is it possible to keep this issue open till then?

(In reply to comment #6) > Thank you for that information. > > I will implement the cell renderer for selectboxes in the next few days. After > this is done, I can finally close this case. Is it possible to keep this issue > open till then?
Sure!
